QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_datatypeconfig.id odf_pk, int_datatypeconfig.external_data_type as external_data_type, int_datatypeconfig.code as code, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, int_datatypeconfig.clarity_data_type as clarity_data_type, INT_DATATYPECONFIG.CREATED_DATE as created_date, INT_DATATYPECONFIG.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, int_datatypeconfig.direction as direction from int_datatypeconfig int_datatypeconfig, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED where 1 = 1 and int_datatypeconfig.created_by = CREATED.user_id and int_datatypeconfig.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id
